name: Empty Desert (Pine Ridge Tract)
description: A vast, empty expanse of sun-baked desert, stretching towards a distant ridge under an indifferent sky. The ground is cracked and dry, dotted with sparse, hardy scrub that clings stubbornly to life. A few scattered, hardy cacti stand as silent sentinels to the relentless heat and desolation. To the west, more empty scrubland stretches, and to the south, a similar desolate expanse, promising nothing but quiet, comfortable emptiness. The air is still, thick with dust and the relentless heat, broken only by the distant caw of a crow and the endless hum of unseen insects, oblivious to the subtle grit of the west.
